title: Shriram Transport Finance zooms 7% as Q4 PAT surges 44% YoY - Economic Times
content: Shriram Transport Finance zooms 7% as Q4 PAT surges 44% YoY  Economic Times
description: Total assets under management (AUM) increased 8 per cent to Rs 1.27 lakh crore from Rs 1.17 lakh crore a year ago. Net interest margins, the difference between the interest earned by the company on loans and that paid on deposits, expanded to 6.96 per cent from 6.80 per cent a year ago.
